document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Kalzas Project in North America dated October 2001
document.description: This report outlines the exploration and evaluation of the Kalzas tungsten property by Copper Ridge Explorations Inc., describing the geology, mineralization, and recommendations for future work.
